channel.title: PartyRock-X!/project aggression... currently thinking of way to improve eco
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][font=impact][center][b]PROJECT AGGRESSION![/b][/center]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/15343e0.png[/img]
Welcome to project aggression. This is going to be a dev for a long time. i want this perfect. i plan to release this after 2 months of hosting for all of you that are wondering. My friends of mopar know that i hate PI, but im trying it out. this will be sadly my last 317. i want to go out with a bang. There wont be many customs but there will be some customs that are useful to the server. i have many ideas that are unique. i hope you guys support and enjoy! remember dont flame because im just trying to improve my java!
[font=arial black][size=36pt]SUPPORTERS[/size][/font]
Runewings317 (honored supporter) <--- my idol on mopar Adobe RiipiinFTW <---- my other idol Lostmyphat <---- idol and awesome coder SJ` <--- the most honorable supporter because i love him <-- my idol <3 lilxCJ <---- ultra babe drubrkletern <---- my soon to be idol <3 imsuperman05 <--- one of the best coders on this community and hes a god pk2play judostar1 <-- idol and he knows what hes doing :)
[size=18pt][font=impact]Features[/font][/size] KEY - red = not started green = finished yellow = started
duel arena player owned shops Finished quest tab (its erased atm) A REALLY NICE COMBAT SYSTEM economy such as npcdrops, rares, prices in shops. PK kill exchange weclient super unique home(no custom maps) never before seen skilling area (still looking for a nice one) Godwars! Custom skill! Might do a Duel arena Point shop PK arena FunPK with FunPK shop ticket shop/ what i mean is if you kill monkeys they drop tickets and you exchange them for items A nice 474 game frame :) A nice boss system to earn rares and pk gear from! Holiday events! Some quests! Nice staff Rewriting most of the skills because some ATM suck! Fixingnup teleports Some commands for players(: Vote4cash Donater stuff Donated area Vote shop New minigame (haven't thought it over yet? any ideas) Bounty hunter (not on my major get to first list) I really want to get clan wars done(safe and dangerous portal)
What this server is not going to have: No fucking dspk stuff! Like 525 anims! No extremely gay models. Only runescape stuff like the new whip
developers - hoster: Mazin Coders - only me atm forums - not approved yet.
Pictures -
just a custom item i have all other chaotics are added also [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/vshsur.jpg[/img] bosses [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2v2b9jp.jpg[/img] clan chat woot [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/24xfhic.jpg[/img] prayer [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2i0ug0n.jpg[/img] duel arena (my favorite) [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/or7z41.jpg[/img] mining skilling [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/rlksxz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2573bmc.jpg[/img]
thank you guys. hope your support. im working really hard on this. thanks everyone. i also would like to make a shoutout to kozs and iambuzn for inspiring me to get into coding a while back.
comment on what you think the custo skill should be... ill add a poll and see what people say. Want to know more? add my skype - roxofan17 MSN - Ftoresco@aol.com[/center]
[size=36pt]UPDATES[/size] 10/22/11 fixed up duel arena a lil, going to be adding some drops to npcdrops to improve the eco! after that going to be fixing some dupes and bugs.... i hate them. :)
[size=18pt][font=impact]APPLY HERE![/font][/size] hoster 0/1 web devoloper 2/2 programmers 1/2 or 3 Client programmers 0/1
Programmer app and client app [code]name: Age: Experience: Proof: how many years have you done java?: [/code]

item.title: PartyRock-X!/project aggression... currently thinking of way to improve eco
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[center][size=18pt][font=impact][center]PROJECT AGGRESSION![/center]

Welcome to project aggression. This is going to be a dev for a long time. i want this perfect. i plan to release this after 2 months of hosting for all of you that are wondering. My friends of mopar know that i hate PI, but im trying it out. this will be sadly my last 317. i want to go out with a bang. There wont be many customs but there will be some customs that are useful to the server. i have many ideas that are unique. i hope you guys support and enjoy!
remember dont flame because im just trying to improve my java!

[font=arial black][size=36pt]SUPPORTERS[/size][/font]

Runewings317 (honored supporter) <— my idol on mopar
Adobe
RiipiinFTW <---- my other idol
Lostmyphat <---- idol and awesome coder
SJ` <— the most honorable supporter because i love him <-- my idol <3
lilxCJ <---- ultra babe
drubrkletern <---- my soon to be idol <3
imsuperman05 <— one of the best coders on this community and hes a god
pk2play
judostar1 <-- idol and he knows what hes doing

[size=18pt][font=impact]Features[/font][/size]
KEY - red = not started
green = finished
yellow = started

duel arena
player owned shops
Finished quest tab (its erased atm)
A REALLY NICE COMBAT SYSTEM
economy such as npcdrops, rares, prices in shops.
PK kill exchange
weclient
super unique home(no custom maps)
never before seen skilling area (still looking for a nice one)
Godwars!
Custom skill!
Might do a Duel arena Point shop
PK arena
FunPK with FunPK shop
ticket shop/ what i mean is if you kill monkeys they drop tickets and you exchange them for items
A nice 474 game frame
A nice boss system to earn rares and pk gear from!
Holiday events!
Some quests!
Nice staff
Rewriting most of the skills because some ATM suck!
Fixingnup teleports
Some commands for players(:
Vote4cash
Donater stuff
Donated area
Vote shop
New minigame (haven’t thought it over yet? any ideas)
Bounty hunter (not on my major get to first list)
I really want to get clan wars done(safe and dangerous portal)

What this server is not going to have:
No fucking dspk stuff! Like 525 anims!
No extremely gay models. Only runescape stuff like the new whip

developers -
hoster: Mazin
Coders - only me atm
forums - not approved yet.

Pictures -

just a custom item i have all other chaotics are added also

bosses

clan chat woot

prayer

duel arena (my favorite)

mining skilling

thank you guys. hope your support. im working really hard on this. thanks everyone.
i also would like to make a shoutout to kozs and iambuzn for inspiring me to get into coding a while back.

comment on what you think the custo skill should be… ill add a poll and see what people say.
Want to know more? add my skype - roxofan17
MSN - Ftoresco@aol.com[/center]

[size=36pt]UPDATES[/size]
10/22/11
fixed up duel arena a lil, going to be adding some drops to npcdrops to improve the eco!
after that going to be fixing some dupes and bugs… i hate them.

[size=18pt][font=impact]APPLY HERE![/font][/size]
hoster 0/1
web devoloper 2/2
programmers 1/2 or 3
Client programmers 0/1
